sales.name: Statement Rugs: Up to 60% Off
sales.description: Some rugs are content to fade into the background. Not these. Ultra-bold prints, from fireworks to abstract geometrics, make them standouts. Each one has the ability to single-handedly define a room’s look.

sales.name: In Bloom: Summer Florals
sales.description: Enchanting and elegant, floral prints never seem to go out of style — and this selection ensures that you’ll have plenty of options to nail one of our favorite summer looks. You’ll find roses, wildflowers, and abstract prints in this bouquet of striking pieces, from floaty sundresses and cool tiered skirts to delicate wrap blouses and edgy jackets. With romance everywhere you look, these pieces will leave a trail of swoons in their wake.

sales.name: Refresh Your Jewelry Box
sales.description: Can a woman ever have too much jewelry? Not if you ask us — and you'll agree when you lay eyes on the finds we've rounded up. Reinvent your jewelry collection with the striking baubles on offer here: We've got rings, bracelets, necklaces, and earrings from some of your favorite designer names.

sales.name: Weekend Wear
sales.description: Sure, you can lose the tie when the weekend hits (though you don't have to), but that doesn’t mean it’s time to slip into your finest sweatsuit and pretend it’s proper clothing. Make sure your off-the-clock look is up to snuff with this collection of casual gear. It’s everything you need to keep that style kicking on Saturday and Sunday.

sales.name: Saucony, Puma & More
sales.description: With summer in full swing, it's high time to make sure your body is perfectly beach-ready. Luckily, we’ve got a range of super-cool kicks to get you moving again, from Saucony, Puma, and other top names. Go for high-performance walking sneakers by MBT, extra-stability running sneakers by New Balance, or hipster high-tops by Adidas Originals. And just in case your workout gets rained out? We’ve got some fun rain boots in this sale, too.

sales.name: Tee-licious: Our Best Summer Shirts
sales.description: T-shirts that will help kids beat the heat — think stripes, solids, and frilly details.

sales.name: Shoe Envy: Must-Have Summer Styles
sales.description: Whether your go-to summer piece is a boho-chic floral sundress or an up-to-there denim mini, the hot weather calls for bare legs, pedicures, and the perfect shoes to show them off. With everything from low-flying neutrals and metallics to sexy caged styles and slingbacks in this array, you'll find plenty of pairs that are sure to become your favorites this season.

sales.name: Up to 80% Off Gloster Outdoor
sales.description: You should never compromise your decorating style with frumpy outdoor furnishings — and with this selection of weather-resistant seating and tables, you won’t have to. Find chairs, tables, ottomans, bars, loungers, and more, all available in a wide variety of finishes from stainless steel to teak.

sales.name: Sunglasses Shop: Paul Smith & More
sales.description: Let the sun shine in — and look super-cool all summer long — with this luxe roundup of shades featuring a who’s-who of eyewear designers. Our handpicked selection offers sunnies in every shape and color. Choose from oversized round frames by Roberto Cavalli, two-tone square numbers by Marc Jacobs, classic cat eyes by Paul Smith, and many more. Or get more than one: You have our blessing!

sales.name: Summer Style Guide
sales.description: Call it the one-stop shop for all your warm-weather needs. This collection has everything from clothing to footwear to accessories that'll keep you looking stylish — even through the dog days of summer. So whether you're building out a whole wardrobe, or grabbing that one piece you're missing, we've got you covered.

sales.name: Swim Shop
sales.description: Swim season is here. And that means it’s time to invest in a great pair of trunks or boardshorts to keep you looking stylish whether you’re at the beach, the pool, or just hanging out in the hot tub.

sales.name: Decorative Pillows by Jiti
sales.description: These cheery throw cushions will brighten any room for summer. Their refreshing colors and eye-pleasing prints signal a season of relaxation and fun (and did we mention mojitos?).

sales.name: Saturday Selects From Park & Bond
sales.description: Each week, we bring you some of the very best of what’s on offer at our editorially driven brother site. From chinos and sport shirts to accessories and shoes, these in-season essentials are as versatile as they are stylish.

sales.name: Home Decor Under $50
sales.description: Personalize your space without pillaging your checking account: Here, you’ll find Italian glass vases, embellished bowls, candle holders, picture frames, and more — and each one is under $50.

sales.name: Lighten Up: Sheers, Lace & More
sales.description: Looking to add a hint of sexiness to your everyday summer wardrobe? This sale is sheer genius. You’ll find airy blouses and tanks in every hue, structured pleated tops begging to be paired with pencil skirts, pretty silk flutter dresses, soft linen vests, and more. The secret to a chic and flirty look all season long? Start with the picks in this collection.

sales.name: Wardrobe Essentials: Everything You Need
sales.description: Meet the components of classic, versatile style: the jersey dress, the summer sweater, the chino, the rose gold watch, the summer bracelet, the casual shoe, and the satchel.

sales.name: Italian Kitchen
sales.description: Art, soul, and seriously high-quality tools: all three of these elements comprise the Italian kitchen. To that end, you’ll find colorful, stylish essentials and accents here, from cheese graters and washing bowls to wine-themed art prints. We’ve also got a selection of foods and wines that’ll instantly transport you to the Boot.

sales.name: Swim Shop Feat. Tori Praver
sales.description: Whether you're summering in the Hamptons, going on a glam Riviera getaway, or just sunning in your own backyard, we've got you covered with this swimsuit sale from model-designer (and Maui native) Tori Praver and other top names. Snap up bold, bright one-pieces and bikinis for the beach and super-soft coverups perfect for strolling the boardwalk. Now all you're missing is sunscreen. Beach season, let’s do this!

sales.name: Best Bets Under $50
sales.description: Our roundup of great picks under $50 is all about elevating your style without devastating your wallet. So whether you're looking to fill a gap in your wardrobe or to rebuild it entirely, we’ve got what you need to do it without breaking the bank.

sales.name: The Boys' Shop
sales.description: Rough-and-tumble boys can wear out their outfits quickly, and our team kept that in mind when we chose this selection of boys' clothes (let the summer fun begin!). Everything in this sale can stand up to the ultimate level of wear and tear.

sales.name: Dolce Vita & DV by Dolce Vita Shoes
sales.description: Our favorite California-based shoe label rarely makes a misstep, and this playful collection of summer shoes by Dolce Vita and its sister line, DV, proves why: All of your favorites — think strappy coil sandals, cheery flats, and just-sexy-enough wedges — are here, plus a selection of neutral styles that will transition seamlessly into fall and beyond.

sales.name: The Girls' Shop
sales.description: From swimsuits to shoes, this sale is packed with some of our favorite looks for girls. And since this bunch includes both versatile neutrals and playful brights, she'll have plenty to choose from no matter her style.

sales.name: Organize Your Pantry
sales.description: When your pantry’s organized, cooking becomes a snap. The key is to containerize, so that you can see what you’ve got (these clear, lockable storage sets and sturdy steel canisters will help you do just that). We’ve also got plenty of tasty stuff, from exotic salts and peppers to fruit preserves that’ll keep that pantry well stocked and your taste buds titillated.

sales.name: Twenty8Twelve
sales.description: A celebrity-designed clothing brand is always a point of intrigue — and we're happy to report that this collection from actress Sienna Miller and her sister, Savannah, delivers hit after hit. Their boho-chic touch is unmistakable in these feminine-meets-edgy separates: cropped leather jackets, loose raglan-sleeved sweaters, perfectly sexy tanks, and leg-baring sundresses, to name a few of our favorites.

sales.name: Brighten Up Your Home
sales.description: Itching to brighten up your room? Put down the paintbrush, and pick up some accessories instead: they’re a great way to get color without a lot of commitment. This bold-hued selection (anchored by stunning glass vases and bowls) will instantly add energy to your space. For maximum impact, group items of different height and color together.

sales.name: Jeanine Payer Jewelry
sales.description: In the mood for romance? It's hard not to fall for this selection of jewelry by designer Jeanine Payer. Find pendants, rings, and bracelets featuring the hand-engraved famous words of poets and artists, along with simple earrings, charm necklaces, and bracelets delicately crafted from gold, semi-precious stones, and diamonds.

sales.name: Summer Staples: Chinos & Shorts
sales.description: Those beat up, oversized chinos and shorts you've held onto since college? It's time to let 'em go. Stock up on the new breed of the warm-weather essentials — think slim, trim, and decidedly modern — in this sale, and you'll be ready to take on the summer in style.

sales.name: Best Society
sales.description: Playful, unique style is at the heart of this collection by Best Society, which caters to the young, style-savvy tastemakers who own indie boutiques and love hitting the newest restaurant openings. Exhibiting bold colors and jaunty prints, the sundresses, tanks, and blouses here are vintage-inspired but with a decidedly modern twist. Ladies, meet your new summer go-tos.

sales.name: Baby Boutique
sales.description: Parents, meet your secret weapon: From naptime to mealtime to playtime — and any other time you can think of — this sale has you covered. Adorable baby clothes, toys, and furniture are just some of the must-haves you'll find in this array from our favorite baby brands. We have chic maternity clothes for moms, too!

sales.name: Bright Summer Jewelry Feat. Tova
sales.description: Summer and brightly colored jewelry go hand-in-hand, so you won’t want to miss this sale featuring Tova, from Canadian designer Michelle Luterman, and other like-minded lines. The looks here are nature-inspired — adorned with chunky semi-precious stones, crystals, beading, and metal, these pieces are anything but simple. Layer on the colorful cluster pendants, fringe bracelets, and chain necklaces for an offbeat tribal aesthetic.

sales.name: Sneakers in Your Size
sales.description: Every guy needs a good pair of sneakers. And whether you’re looking for something techy and fashion-forward, or just a pair of classic, comfortable kicks, we’ve got you covered in this massive sale. Worried about whether that perfect pair will fit? Don’t be. Everything on offer here is just your size. Easy.

sales.name: Livable-Modern Furnishings
sales.description: Unquestionably modern yet entirely livable: that’s the design refrain of all the furnishings from California-based Allan Copley. They specialize in both wood and metal furniture — a dichotomy that works extremely well (the tall, sleek metal James bookcase, for instance, contrasts beautifully with the warmth of the Asian-inspired wooden Dado nesting tables).

sales.name: Japanese Weekend Maternity & More
sales.description: Maternity clothes moms-to-be will love, including dresses, tops, cardigans, and more.

sales.name: Organize Your Bath & Laundry
sales.description: Unclutter your bath by stashing your combs, sponges, products, and more in these elegant boxes, jars, and dispensers. Pick up a couple of baskets and hampers while you're at it, and control that tower of towels. And make doing the wash a lot less daunting with laundry sorters and organizers.

sales.name: Trina Turk
sales.description: Life’s a beach for California girl Trina Turk, who got her start designing for Ocean Pacific before launching her own line of vibrant, playful dresses, separates, jewelry, and more. Today’s collection — your summer uniform whether you’re jetting off to Saint-Tropez or attending a swanky rooftop party — includes pretty ruffled blouses, flirty jumpsuits, '60s- and '70s-inspired colors and prints, and more.

sales.name: Low Luv x Erin Wasson Jewelry
sales.description: The rocker-chic pieces in this collection are true show-stoppers, and we expect no less from fashion world darling and model-turned-designer Erin Wasson. We love the dose of cool and creativity these styles add to even the most basic summer getups — especially the snake cuffs, cross hoop earrings, and high-octane designs in hammered silver and gold.

sales.name: Sally Miller Summer Apparel
sales.description: Sally Miller takes design advice from her own daughters when crafting these tween-pleasing clothes, so even the fussiest fashionistas will love this selection. Dresses come in cool patterns and styles, and printed tops feature ruffles for a dose of frilly fun.

sales.name: Watches by Lucien Piccard & Christian Bernard Paris
sales.description: Time-honored Swiss watch brand Lucien Piccard and French company Christian Bernard do everything, from sporty to dressed-up. You'll find the full spectrum in this sale: burly divers, sleek dress watches, and more. Whatever you choose, it's sure to get you where you're going on time and in style.

sales.name: Stylish Office: Furniture
sales.description: These furnishings will set the tone for an office that’s stylish and that works well. From contemporary desks and chairs to sleek credenzas and shelving systems, each piece possesses that rare combination of sophistication and practicality.

sales.name: Mi & O Apparel & Shoes
sales.description: The adorable clothes and shoes from Mi & O are hard to pass up! Little girls will love the sundresses and jumpsuits, and boys will stay stylish in Bermuda shorts and striped tees.

sales.name: Stylish Office: Lighting
sales.description: When it comes to office lighting, it’s absolutely critical to have a blend of style and function (one won’t work without the other). These floor, pendant, task, and table lamps do just that. Throughout, the style sensibility is sleek and modern. But it's also classic — these pieces will never look “so three years ago.”

sales.name: Halabaloo Girls' Dresses
sales.description: These sweet dresses will be a treat for your little glamour girl. Halabaloo serves up ensembles with polka dots, ruffles, colorful flower appliques, and other charming embellishments that will help your little one get her twirl on.

sales.name: Stylish Office: Art
sales.description: This out-of-the-ordinary art will keep you inspired while you work. Choose whatever image suits you — vintage clocks, scientific drawings, street signs, modern geometrics, and iconic masterworks — and group a few together on a wall for maximum effect.

sales.name: Stylish Office: Accessories
sales.description: Furniture and lighting are critical to a stylish office, but it’s still not complete without the right accessories. Here, we’ve got the perfect finishing touches that will reflect your style and personality — think colorful wall clocks, novel paperweights and bookends, bold-printed notebooks, and sleek business-card holders. They’re the little things that’ll take your space from good to great.

sales.name: Honeywell Safes & Shredders
sales.description: Don’t take your cherished possessions for granted: Protect them with these compact security safes from Honeywell, one of the top names in the field. Security boxes and water- and fire-proof chests will keep your essential documents — and anything else you wish to protect — safe in case of catastrophe. Also on offer are paper shredders — a must-have for protecting your personal info.

sales.name: Watches by Lucien Piccard & Christian Bernard Paris
sales.description: Time-honored Swiss watch brand Lucien Piccard and French company Christian Bernard do everything, from sporty to opulent. You'll find the full spectrum in this sale: diamond-encrusted stunners, understated gold and mother-of-pearl numbers, and rugged men's-inspired watches. Whatever style you choose, it's sure to get you where you're going on time — and in high style.

sales.name: Stylish Office: iPhone & iPad Accessories
sales.description: For many of us, our iPhones and iPads are more than just tech devices. They’re little friends with touch screens. Keep them protected with these luxe leather holders, and keep them charged with these portable stereo systems. If you’re so inclined, give them an old-school vibe with colorful retro handsets.

sales.name: Bollywood Posters Curated by Michael Aram
sales.description: A part-time resident of India, artist and designer Michael Aram has combed his adopted country for plenty of inspiration, and the result is a seemingly endless collection of curated finds. For this sale, we’re turning our attention to the wonderfully colorful world of Bollywood films. Each authentic movie poster comes stylishly framed.

sales.name: Darcy Brown: British Kids' Clothes
sales.description: Darcy Brown's British kids' clothes are making their debut on Gilt Baby & Kids. Reasons why we're in love: 1) The striped and floral patterns are classic but kid-friendly. 2) All the fabrics are high-quality but still machine washable. 3) The rompers, dresses, shorts, and polo shirts (we dig the adorable anchor graphic) are just so darn cute!

sales.name: Style Your Dog: Handcrafted Collars & Leashes
sales.description: Your dog looks so 2007. Bring him or her up to date with these handcrafted accents like studded and jewel-accented leather collars — plus durable leashes to complement them — by Dean & Tyler.

sales.name: Alpha Industries & More
sales.description: Called upon by the Department of Defense, Alpha Industries has produced jackets for the Army, Navy, and Air Force since 1959. The surplus material went to the creation of military-inspired outerwear for adults and kids, and the selection here will whip your child's wardrobe into shape.

sales.name: The Cutest Kids' Sox
sales.description: These colorful socks for tiny tootsies come in an array of patterns that will keep kids on their toes. Choose from argyle and dot patterns or two-toned solids — the styles we have here will fit every personality.

sales.name: Dr. Hauschka Skin Care
sales.description: Do you want your conscience to be as clear as your skin? A leader in plant-based skin care, Dr. Hauschka products encourage your skin to replenish itself the all-natural way. In this sale, choose from benefit-rich cleansers, masks, body oils, deodorant, and more — just in time to quench your skin’s thirst and get a gorgeous glow after hours spent in the summertime sun.

sales.name: Paper Hat Press: Custom-Made Kids' Books
sales.description: Making these personalized kids' books is just as easy as making a paper hat. After purchasing a voucher here, go to paperhatpress.com and choose a book based on your child's age and gender. Then enter your child's name, birthday, favorite food, etc. into the order form, and customize the character to look like your little one. Et voilà! Best part: The whole process only takes five minutes.

sales.name: Maternal America
sales.description: Moms-to-be, have your pick of these polished everyday maternity clothes to keep you (and your bump) looking chic. The empire-waist dresses are beautifully nipped and draped to accentuate top halves, while stylish tops and comfy bottoms anchor each look.

sales.name: Get the Look: Poolside Party
sales.description: Going to a pool party is a balancing act. You want to look your best, of course, but you also want to stay cool and be ready to, you know, actually get in the pool. Simply put: this is not the time or the place for your beat up swimsuit and an old T-shirt. Luckily, we’ve got you covered with this selection of sharp gear and stylish trunks. Suit up.

sales.name: Smart Summer Tailoring
sales.description: Stay sharp from collar to cuff this season with our collection of trim, tailored suits, shirts, and more from the likes of Joseph Abboud, Tommy Hilfiger, Italia Independent, and more.

sales.name: Brave the Water: Jump, Slide & Bounce!
sales.description: Water sports are one of the best things about summer. While swimming and boogie boarding are fun, kids will get a thrill out of the water trampolines, kayaks, and tubing equipment we have here. Ride the wave while our sale lasts!

sales.name: Summer Fun With KidKraft & More
sales.description: If you don't live near a beach, no worries! There are lots of outdoor activities kids can do right in your backyard. Keep them entertained with adorable wooden playhouses, or let them build a castle in a sandbox (the pirate-ship themed one here is our all-time favorite). And if your little artist loves arts and crafts, take the project outside on our mini table-and-bench set.

sales.name: Rockabye: Up to 50% Off!
sales.description: Rocking horses are so old-school. For a fun, fresh take on this classic toy try Rockabye’s rocking toys, which include monkeys, grasshoppers, and dolphins; or let your tot go for a ride on a pirate ship or a princess carriage. Made with huggable fabrics and interactive buttons that help teach numbers, colors, and the ABCs, your kid will love rocking out.

sales.name: The Basics Shop: Feat. Trafalgar Leather
sales.description: When it comes to building a great wardrobe, start with the basics. We've got a selection of go-to pieces here — from underwear and socks to shirts and shoes — that’ll set you on the road to a properly outfitted closet.

sales.name: Fine Jewelry Personal Shopping
sales.description:
Our Fine Jewelry Personal Shopping team is now available to offer one-on-one assistance in finding everything from classic investment pieces to one-of-a-kind designs not currently available on Gilt.com. To give you some idea of the kinds of gorgeous gems to which we have access, we’ve rounded up an amazing array of finds for your perusing pleasure, including multi-gem earrings, museum-worthy necklaces, and diamonds galore.

Looking for something you don’t see here? Contact our Personal Jewelry Shopping team at jewelryrequests@gilt.com or (855) 758-3765.
